910990.name: Urban Lockdown
910990.description:
Experience heart-pounding, non-stop action in this thrilling side-scrolling beat 'em up game!
From the creator of the smash hit Bad Ass Babes comes an adrenaline-fueled adventure that will have you on the edge of your seat. The evil crime lord Sanchez has broken out of prison and unleashed chaos upon the cityâ€”it's up to YOU to restore order and bring peace back to the streets!
